Welcome!

to the new website for the HBS Grupos Medical Collaboration. A location for the collaboration of medical groups, teams, and providers that work with and alongside the Hospital el Buen Samaritano Medical Collaboration in La Romana, Dominican Republic.

Please look around and join us as we work together to improve the health of the people of the bateyes of La Romana.
